submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, m: int, n: int, horizontalCut: List[int], verticalCut: List[int]) -> int:
        horizontalCut = sorted(horizontalCut, reverse=True)
        verticalCut = sorted(verticalCut, reverse=True)
        sum1 = sum(horizontalCut)
        sum2 = sum(verticalCut)
        
        p1 = p2 = 0
        to_ret = sum1 + sum2
        while p1 < m-1 and p2 < n-1 :
            if horizontalCut[p1] >= verticalCut[p2] :
                to_ret += sum2
                sum1 -= horizontalCut[p1]
                p1 += 1
            else :
                to_ret += sum1
                sum2 -= verticalCut[p2]
                p2 += 1
                
        
        return to_ret
